definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
aspect particle, such as 著|着[zhe5], 了[le5], 過|过[guo4]
structural particle, such as 的[de5], 地[de5], 得[de5] and 所[suo3]

sentences.english: This paper studies the evaluative meanings of Japanese toritate-particles.
sentences.chinese: 本文考察日语提示助词表达的评价性意义。

sentences.english: The basic function of the Cantonese final particles is assisting the intonation to convey moods.
sentences.chinese: 广州话句末语气助词的基本功能是辅助句调表达语气。

sentences.english: Chinese modal particles are meant to add supplementary meanings to the affective meaning of a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 语气助词的本质意义在于附加句子的情感意义。

sentences.english: Estimates expression of the general as "Number of utterances" Plus the number of structure.
sentences.chinese: 约量的表达方式般为“数助词”加数量结构。

sentences.english: Chinese modal particles belong to functional auxiliary words, whose modal meanings are elusive.
sentences.chinese: 汉语语气词属功能助词，其语气义是难以捉摸的。

sentences.english: The contradiction and identity of Japanese auxiliary words are the fundamental attributes of modern Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 日语助词间的对立和同一是现代日语的基本属性。

definition: structural particle, such as 的[de5], 地[de5], 得[de5] and 所[suo3]
form word/in Classical Chinese, the first character of phrase having auxiliary grammatical function
